mapper.update:
update leanin_call_back_config
config_status = #{configStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
config_type = #{configType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ward_code = #{wardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deal_with_name = #{dealWithName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dela_with_phone = #{delaWithPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
config_creater = #{configCreater},
config_time = #{configTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
config_state = #{configState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where config_num = #{configNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
